SummaryEnglish: Based on Capcom’s hit franchise, Monster Hunter, an exciting new anime comes from the creative minds behind Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. In a world where people and monsters are at odds, some learn to coexist. Known as Riders, they awaken the powers of monsters and live alongside them in secrecy. Now, one young boy journeys to find his own companion and become the world’s greatest Rider.

1.SummaryEnglish: Aspiring young Rider Lute and friends go in search of a Monstie Egg on the eve of the Kinship Rite. A search that takes them into dangerous territory.

2.SummaryEnglish: It's Kinship Rite time! Lilia and Cheval are uncertain about their futures, while an unexpected attack on Hakum Village sends its Riders scrambling.

3.SummaryEnglish: A Hunter is headed for secretive Hakum Village. He's sure to have his own way of dealing with all these monsters showing up where they don't belong...

4.SummaryEnglish: Chief Omna sends the apprentice Riders off in search of the Waterfall of Trials. A visitor to Hakum Village gives Lilia inspiration for her future.

5.SummaryEnglish: Hakum Village revives the beloved Monstie Races for their four newest Riders, but Lute could still use a lot more practice piloting his powerful pal.

6.SummaryEnglish: Lute and friends dream about what they'd buy with the proceeds from a rare and valuable golden Gargwa egg, and Cheval decides to try hunting one down.

7.SummaryEnglish: The mischievous twins Den-Den and Lin-Lin are stirring up trouble in Hakum Village--and run into trouble of their own in the forboding woods at night.

8.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Pink the traveling merchant stops by the village, and Navirou falls hard for her Felyne assistant Mocha. How far will he go in the name of love?

9.SummaryEnglish: Dan has doubts about whether he should be leading the Riders in training, and remembers his old friend Silva, who was once a shoo-in to be the leader.

10.SummaryEnglish: In the latest ill omen, the village's beneficial wind turns violent. Hyoro struggles to live up to the expectations of his demanding brother Genie.

11.SummaryEnglish: Lilia leads her friends into the woods to investigate the evil changes taking place. There they learn about a legendary Rider and about Lute's folks.

12.SummaryEnglish: A Blight-mad Nargacuga attacks the village, leaving a trail of blind destruction in its wake as Riders young and old do all they can to drive it away.

13.SummaryEnglish: There's no time to clean up after the Nargacuga when it could attack the village again at any moment. Cheval swears revenge and takes a new Monstie.

14.SummaryEnglish: The apprentice Riders go off on their own to face the Blighted Nargacuga, but it's going to be tough with Lute's Monstie still recovering back home...

15.SummaryEnglish: The time has come for the young Riders to venture forth beyond Hakum Village, accompanied by excitement, responsibility, and not a little trepidation.

16.SummaryEnglish: Having started their journey outside the village, Lute and Navirou get separated from the others, and find a girl who is hurt and in need of help.

17.SummaryEnglish: Lute, Navirou, and Avinia encounter an enigmatic, riddle-loving innkeeper who stands between them and the help Avinia needs for her beloved Monstie.

18.SummaryEnglish: Lute and friends are dazzled by the big city, but they soon get down to business: finding the Scriveners and a way to keep the Black Blight in check.

19.SummaryEnglish: It's questing time in the Hunter city of Gildegaran! A task that looks like a piece of cake winds up being more than Lute and Navirou bargained for.

20.SummaryEnglish: Lute and Lilia stumble across a Felyne village while searching for a Kinship Ore. Navirou is confronted by a strange Felyne who insists they're pals.

21.SummaryEnglish: Lilia brings the young Riders a request from the Scriveners that sends them through a vast desert in search of a solution to the Black Blight problem.

22.SummaryEnglish: The group meets with Hunter opposition in the Oasum refugee camp. A desert battle with a Blighted monster gets an unexpected (and unwelcome) assist.

23.SummaryEnglish: Dan and the other senior Riders meet up with Lute's party in the desert, where Chief Nolma shares some info that changes the course of their quest.

24.SummaryEnglish: The rift deepens between fellow Riders Lute and Cheval as their attitudes toward rogue monsters drift further apart. Lute reunites with an old friend.

25.SummaryEnglish: After proving their mettle against the Blighted Diablos near the ruins of Reverto's hometown, the Riders reach an understanding about the road ahead.

26.SummaryEnglish: Lute wants the same Monstie as the legendary hero Redan. Debli's teacher seems to know where to find precisely the Monstie Egg he's looking for.

27.SummaryEnglish: Why does Navirou's head hurt at the very mention of the Dovan Volcano? Lute runs into a couple of troublemakers en route to the next Kinship Ore.

28.SummaryEnglish: Discarded like so much trash, Navirou happens to reunite with some old friends. If only he could remember them, or the grand plan they had to escape.

29.TitleEnglish: The Dragon in the Sea of Fire
29.SummaryEnglish: Lute and the Numbers face off against Dr. Manelger in his subterranean lab, where the mad scientist has an unpleasant mechanized surprise for them.

30.SummaryEnglish: Bent on destroying Blighted monsters, Cheval confronts Lute over his beloved Monstie Ratha, who may not even have the strength to defend himself.

31.TitleEnglish: Be the Forest, Be the Beast
31.SummaryEnglish: Lute and Reverto track a monster into a mine (despite rumors that it's haunted). Whatever they find, what's more worrying is what finds THEM.

32.SummaryEnglish: There's a Blighted monster on Naubaka Island, but no one who sails there comes back. Lute and friends brave the waves with the unique Bandit Captain.

33.SummaryEnglish: Lute and Avinia must defend Koapni Village from the Blighted monster that's been terrorizing the island. Pansy has a big favor to ask Navirou.

34.SummaryEnglish: Chief Mallerie's pickle weight has been stolen! Never fear: Detective Navirou is on the case. Meanwhile, Lute searches for Naubaka's Kinship Ore.

35.SummaryEnglish: Lilia has a strong lead on the whereabouts of the legendary white dragon's egg, that sends Lute and friends into the ruins of the hero Redan's village.

36.SummaryEnglish: Lute follows a tip from the Scriveners to outside Albrachs Village. When he tracks down Dr. Manelger, he gets a Hunter's help (headache).

37.SummaryEnglish: A second Kinship Ore in Hakum Village? Lute returns to his hometown just in time to deal with the devastating fallout of the mad Manelger's meddling.

38.SummaryEnglish: Cheval is back in Hakum Village! He may be too late to slay the Blighted beast, but he sticks around to confront and challenge his former friend Lute.

39.TitleEnglish: Tested at the Tower of Illusion
39.SummaryEnglish: Chief Omna brings Lute to the Tower of Illusion, where he undergoes a tense trial meant to dispel the doubt from his mind and lead him to the truth.

40.SummaryEnglish: Lute accompanies Reverto on a quest to slay Brachydios the Destroyer, an ultra-powerful tempered monster and the expert Hunter's longtime rival.

41.SummaryEnglish: Before Ceval and his team head to the desert to find a Black Diablos running amok, Cheval takes an unexpected (and hopefully more obedient) new Monstie.

42.SummaryEnglish: Lute and Navirou reunite with the Numbers as they search for another Kinship Ore on Mt. Rhyz, where some unexpected company puts their plans on hold.

43.SummaryEnglish: Some familiar faces rejoin Lute on his journey into the Forest of Confusion, hot on the trail of the next Kinship Ore. But the Blight is spreading...

44.SummaryEnglish: The team has a rare encounter with a mysterious Elder Dragon deep in the Forest of Confusion as they continue their search for the Kinship Ore.

45.SummaryEnglish: The final Kinship Ore waits amid freezing mountain ruins. Lute and Manelger are in hot pursuit, but Cheval's new Mechinship Stone changes everything.

46.TitleEnglish: The Legendary White Dragon is Born!
46.SummaryEnglish: Cheval flexes his newfound muscle with his white dragon Monstie, but even he's not safe from the Black Blight. Lute seeks a chance to patch things up.

47.TitleEnglish: This is it: The Black Dread
47.SummaryEnglish: Lute and Cheval face the staggeringly powerful Black Dread, a monster capable of wiping entire villages off the map; Ratha has a fight of his own.

48.SummaryEnglish: Lute and Ratha's pitched battle with the formidable Black Dread rages on, but Lute's secret weapon (the power of Kinship) may finally turn the tide.

49.SummaryEnglish: It is fleeting that the world became peaceful, lutes who know that Ayuria was taken away. It seems that the name of the person who took him was Black Riders. It was a lute who tried to rescue Ayuria from them ...

50.TitleEnglish: A Strong and Dangerous Man Shrouded in Mystery
50.SummaryEnglish: Lute and the others find themselves unable to stand up to Gale of the Ebon Riders. Gale uses the Silver Rathalos, Dusk as his monstie and shows Lute and Ratha its overwhelming power. Gale mentioned that his monstie has undergone the Rite of Channeling. Will Lute and the others be able to escape this!?

51.TitleEnglish: The Biggest Narcissist Ever!? Mad Appears!
51.SummaryEnglish: Mille and Hyoro leave to look for the new Monstie egg. Meanwhile, Nariki and Beats try to reclaim the previous riders Kinship Stones. But then, Mad of the Ebon Riders appears!

52.SummaryEnglish: Cheval leaves with Lute to look for Avinia by themselves. On their way they visit Wakadoka Village, which is protected by an elderly Rider, Talba. The villagers warmly welcome Cheval, but Shadow of the Ebon Riders was also lurking nearby...

53.SummaryEnglish: Nariki doesn't want to go to practice being treated badly by his Monstie Velocidrome, and Navigator Beats. Nariki gets into an argument with Beats. Meanwhile, the Ebon Rider, Wrath is getting closer and closer to Hakum…

54.SummaryEnglish: To help save Avinia, Debli gathers info on the Ebon Riders in Gildegaran. He hears of the Rite of Channeling from Simone and heads to see the Channeler together with Fifi, to do the Rite to Great Poogie.

55.SummaryEnglish: The Ebon Riders are scattered throughout the world to look for Lute and his Kinship Stone. Meanwhile, Lute is training with the Riddlemaster and heads to see a certain monster, to be granted a Kinship Gene.

56.SummaryEnglish: Cheval visits the Riddlemaster to undergo the Rite of Channeling. After being sent deep into the snowy mountains to a place with a strong monster, Cheval collapses with a fever. Cryo tries to save Cheval from this predicament, but then...?!

57.TitleEnglish: It's Hard Being a Vice Captain
57.SummaryEnglish: Pappan is looking for info on the Ebon Riders. Hearing that Lilia has obtained a clue to the reason behind their Kinship Stone collecting, everyone heads to Omi Valley. However, it's such a dangerous place, it's known as a trial ground for Hunters...

58.SummaryEnglish: Everyone decides to go to Pawpad Place to look for info on the Ebon Riders. On their way, they come across Professor Manelger. They hope that he might have info on the Ebon Riders, but something seems off...

59.SummaryEnglish: Cheval's group heads toward Trese Desert. Cheval remembers Nargacuga, a monster he once had as a Monstie in this desert, but cut off his ties with. Meanwhile, Shadow, also heads to Trese Desert to harvest Kinship Stones.

60.SummaryEnglish: The Monstie Races will be held again in Hakum Village this year. Mille, Hyoro, Nariki rush to participate. As the race begins, everyone watches excitedly, but Wrath of the Ebon Riders has also snuck into Hakum Village to steal the Riders' Kinship Stones!

61.SummaryEnglish: Ichibitsu appeared before the numbers. He says he wants Dr. Manelger to fall back to "research loss". Although it is non-elective numbers, I headed to the laboratory to obtain even Ayuria's information at all.

62.SummaryEnglish: Riders in Hakum village who decided to search black castle and search. Meanwhile, Black Riders' Gale appeared again before the lute and Nabeloo. It is Gale who tries to rob the lute's bondstone, but its purpose seems to be different from other black riders ....

63.SummaryEnglish: Lutes who were able to find Ayuria's captive Blackcastle. But before that, the four ruler of Black Riders stands. Could it be that the lute can rescue Ayuria !?

64.SummaryEnglish: The lutes who rescued Ayuria and returned to Hakum village. Ayuria was healed by the exchange with people in Hakum village. Meanwhile, Lute and Cheval will plan a surprise to please Ayuria.

65.SummaryEnglish: Ayuria who came to Daede in order to do a ceremonial tradition to Leoparda. Upon receiving Tsubaki from Deda grandson, when suffering from which monster it got a binding gene, suddenly the girls of Black Riders appeared before Ayuria!

66.SummaryEnglish: Hakum village riders who listen to Gail's identity from Ayuria and discuss Black Riders. At such time, Roroa got into the woods to collect herbs. Black Riders' shadow attacked Hakum village there ....

67.SummaryEnglish: Lutes who think countermeasures against Black Riders aiming at Ayuria. Meanwhile, Gale, who is in Blackcastle, was trying to do a plan, as the superposition ceremony that Anvis had for Shadow failed.

68.SummaryEnglish: Riders at Hakum village where Naliki stores the power, such as making Braque Dios' blow a new Otomon. At such time, Gail of Black Riders attacked Hakum village. However, I will go back to it easily. What is Gayle's true purpose! What?

69.SummaryEnglish: Ayuria who was caught again by Amvis. Lute chasing after that, aiming for black castle. At that time, debris alone was infiltrating Blackcastle as a spy.

70.SummaryEnglish: Gale arrived at Blackcastle earlier than the lute. Amvis intimidated Gail as to put Ayuria on the hostage to put himself on the hostage. To resisting Ayuria and Gale, Amvis starts talking about the relationship between two parents ... ...

71.SummaryEnglish: At last a superimposition ceremony was held, and Ambis and his Otomon Kusade Daola who had powered up. Luteies who are trying to stop progress somehow, but they were unable to approach Amvis because of the storm.

72.SummaryEnglish: Anvis who had destroyed Fulcrumite Geo was proceeding to Gildekaran. Simone and Captain Gentlar who heard the crisis convoke the Old Long Defense Meeting. There are reliable helpers there too ... ...

73.SummaryEnglish: At last the battle of the decisive battle ended and was dropped. Rider and hunter at Monsone Plain, and Aruu also get together to face Amvis. Will the strategy succeed and I can overcome Amvis !?

74.SummaryEnglish: Lutes who do not have the power to make Amvis an increase in power. Meanwhile, Gale tells us that there is a secret to overcome Amvis, and that we need to approach Amvis for that. Lutes who believe in Gail and cooperate. However, there was a big danger in the secret strategy ....

75.SummaryEnglish: The lutes who knocked down Amvis and was able to rescue Michael from the darkness. Although they are relieving lutes, Michael suddenly collapses and goes to a deep sleep. Lullys worried decided to return to Hakum village to quietly rest Michael. So, Michael will have a strange dream ....
